details.otherNames: Japanese: ヴァイオレット・エヴァーガーデン, Hepburn: Vaioretto Evāgāden
details.author: Kana Akatsuki
details.plot: The story follows Violet Evergarden's journey of reintegrating back into society after the war is over as she is no longer a soldier, and her search for her life's purpose in order to understand the last words her mentor and guardian, Major Gilbert, had said to her: "I love you."

details.otherNames: Japanese: 四月は君の嘘, Hepburn: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso
details.author: Naoshi Arakawa
details.plot:
A piano prodigy, whose name is Arima Kousei; lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own. 
He hasn't played since he played for his mother who died a few years ago. One day Arima meets a brilliant violinist - Miyazono Kaori at the park. After their meeting she tries to guide Arima back into the world of music.

details.otherNames: Japanese: 鬼滅の刃, Hepburn: Kimetsu no Yaiba
details.author: Koyoharu Gotouge
details.plot: The story about a family which attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro is on the way to become a demon slayer in order to avenge his family and cure his sister.
